means: 睡地，懒洋洋地，昏昏欲睡地

sentence.Network_en: She turned drowsily on her side, a slow creeping blackness enveloping her mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 她半睡半醒地翻了个身, 一片缓缓蠕动的黑暗渐渐将她的心包围起来.

sentence.Network_en: I felt asleep drowsily before I knew it.
sentence.Network_cn: 不知过了多久,我曚扙地睡着了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: drowsihead 昏昏欲睡的人drowsily 睡地drowsiness 睡意
懒洋洋地的英文|懒洋洋地是什么意思... ... 懒洋洋地 ： drawlingly 懒洋洋地 ： drowsily 懒洋洋地倚靠 ： loll.
爱树者 dendrophile爱睡地 drowsily爱说奉承话的 smarmy
He fell asleep drowsily just at the middle of the road Jinghan Avenue ., 到京汉大道上 , 他昏昏沉沉地就地躺在马路中间睡着了.

list.abs: And, softly dripping, drop by drop 轻柔的水滴,慢慢滴落 Upon the quiet mountain top 爬上寂静山峰的顶端 Steals drowsily and musically 懒洋洋唱着歌偷偷.

entry.def: If you feel drowsy, you feel sleepy and cannot think clearly.

example.ex: He felt pleasantly drowsy and had to fight off the urge to sleep.
example.tran: 他感觉昏昏欲睡，只好尽量克制睡意。

sentences.sentence: "`Time to get up,' she said drowsily"

auth_sentence.content: It must be the dead, Pereda supposed drowsily.
auth_sentence.res_content: It must be the dead, Pereda supposed drowsily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It must be the dead, Pereda supposed drowsily.

auth_sentence.content: Boulders had been strewn here and there with artful artlessness, and lotus leaves tilted drowsily in the water.
auth_sentence.res_content: Boulders had been strewn here and there with artful artlessness, and lotus leaves tilted drowsily in the water.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Boulders had been strewn here and there with artful artlessness, and lotus leaves tilted drowsily in the water.
